\documentclass[zihao = -4]{ctexart}
\pagestyle{plain}
\setlength{\belowcaptionskip}{0.25cm}
\setlength{\abovecaptionskip}{0.25cm}
\linespread{1.0}

% Load Packages--------------------------
\usepackage[a4paper,vmargin=2cm,hmargin=2cm]{geometry}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{ulem}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{multirow}
\usepackage{wrapfig}
\usepackage{colortbl}
\usepackage{pdflscape}
\usepackage{tabu}
\usepackage{threeparttable}
\usepackage{threeparttablex}
\usepackage{makecell}
\usepackage[section]{placeins}
\usepackage{setspace}
\usepackage{titletoc}
\usepackage{tocloft}

\hypersetup{hidelinks}
\setCJKfamilyfont{song}[AutoFakeBold]{SimSun}
\newcommand*{\song}{\CJKfamily{song}}
\floatstyle{plaintop}
\restylefloat{table}
\ctexset{section/number = {}} % 目录一级标题编号为空
\titlecontents{section} % 标题名
              [0cm] % 左间距
              {\zihao{-4} \bfseries} % 标题格式（字体、大小、垂直距离）
              {\contentslabel{2em}} % 编号格式
              {}% % 无序号标题格式
              {\titlerule*[0.5pc]{.}\contentspage} % 指引线、页码

\titlecontents{subsection} % 标题名
              [1.25cm] % 左间距
              {\fontsize{11pt}{13.2pt} \bfseries} % 标题格式（字体、大小、垂直距离）
              {\contentslabel{1.8em}} % 编号格式
              {}% % 无序号标题格式
              {\titlerule*[0.5pc]{.}\contentspage} % 指引线、页码
              
\titlecontents{subsubsection} % 标题名
              [2.05cm] % 左间距
              {\fontsize{11pt}{13.2pt}} % 标题格式（字体、大小、垂直距离）
              {\contentslabel{2.5em}} % 编号格式
              {}% % 无序号标题格式
              {\titlerule*[0.5pc]{.}\contentspage} % 指引线、页码
            

% Pandoc Syntax Highlighting--------------
$if(highlighting-macros)$
$highlighting-macros$
$endif$

% Section Format--------------------------
\titleformat{\section}
  {\zihao{4} \heiti\centering}
  {\bfseries}{0em}
  {}
  []

\titleformat{\subsection}
  {\heiti}
  {\bfseries\arabic{section}.\bfseries\arabic{subsection}}{1em}
  {}
  []
  
\titleformat{\subsubsection}
  {\heiti}
  {\bfseries\arabic{section}.\bfseries\arabic{subsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsection}}{1em}
  {}
  []
  
\titleformat{\subsubsubsection}
  {\heiti}
  {\bfseries\arabic{section}.\bfseries\arabic{subsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsubsection}}{1em}
  {}
  []

\titleformat{\subsubsubsubsection}
  {\heiti}
  {\bfseries\arabic{section}.\bfseries\arabic{subsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsubsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsubsubsection}}{1em}
  {}
  []
  
\titleformat{\subsubsubsubsubsection}
  {\heiti}
  {\bfseries\arabic{section}.\bfseries\arabic{subsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsubsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsubsubsection}.\bfseries\arabic{subsubsubsubsubsection}}{1em}
  {}
  []

\end{table}

$endif$
